message.body: Sorry to bother u in work but ur aunt cherry is busting balls but she's right how many people is the cake gonna serve

Cake pan is 14 3/4 by 11 3/4 inches... so for example we can say its 14x10 (to make it even numbers) and say everyone gets a piece of cake 2x2... would be about 35 pieces but to low ball it, about 30 people
I can bring the pan around if you want to see it
Now u kno I don't kno math... Lmao 30 is fine
How many people you having for Dominique?
I pulled out the cake pan to double check (bec the cake serving charts online are usually wrong)... I honestly think it will make about 12-15 servings.
Oh my.... Def not enough ..... There r prob like 30 35 people
Ok yea I took the pan out and its small plus cakes are smaller than the pans... I can put that cap cake on top of a half sheet cake?
Oh now tht mite work still the same price???
Oh wow give me a day... Gotta let u kno bout tht one.... Thts a bit steep,,,, I'll let u kno either way
